description: A shell script for managing the startup and setup of a PostgreSQL database, including version detection, initialization, server startup, and user/permission configuration.

methods.name: pg_isready
methods.description: Checks if PostgreSQL server is accepting connections on specified port.

methods.name: psql
methods.description: PostgreSQL command-line client used to execute SQL commands and scripts.

methods.name: initdb
methods.description: Initializes a new PostgreSQL data directory.

methods.name: pgrep
methods.description: Searches for processes matching specific criteria, used to check if PostgreSQL process is running.
